content.description:
With 40,000 square kilometres of forests and 17,500 lakes, the Mauricie is a haven for fresh air lovers.

Whether youre here for an outdoors family vacation, the adrenaline of a sport getaway or a hike through the mountains, Québecs real nature has it all. Paddle along the majestic Saint-Maurice, raft on the turbulent waters of the Mattawin River or enjoy canoe-camping in the regions wildlife reserves

Main regions are served by the cities of Trois-Riviere (lower), Shawinigan (middle) and La Tuque (upper).
